thread.title: JOAN SUDHEIMER

author: JOAN SUDHEIMER
title: JOAN SUDHEIMER
text: Both the US and Cuban guides who travelled with us were very informative and helpful. Our days were full with a variety of learning experiences and we were given a good overview of the culture, history, educational system, health care, and current changes in the economy. It was good as US citizens who new little about the country, that we were able to ask many questions of the various people that we met in such a variety of different positions. Globus did a very good job of giving us an excellent experience.
